name: Draymond Green
description: 6'6" power forward, Warriors dynasty linchpin. 4-time champion, DPOY, 4-time All-Star. Does the dirty work - screens, defense, technicals. The emotional engine.

natural-shooting-motion.name: Natural Shooting Motion
natural-shooting-motion.description: 2016 Finals - The infamous kick that cost the Warriors
natural-shooting-motion.prompt: power forward with leg kicked out high after shot attempt - the infamous 'natural shooting motion' with foot at groin level, arms extended from jumper, slight smirk knowing exactly what happened, controversial but effective
natural-shooting-motion.energy: dirty play disguised, walking the line

screaming-and-one.name: Screaming And-One
screaming-and-one.description: Signature celebration - flexing and screaming after big play
screaming-and-one.prompt: power forward screaming and flexing after and-one basket - veins popping, mouth wide open in primal roar, muscles tensed, fists clenched, pure emotional explosion, the heart and soul of a dynasty

defensive-stance.name: DPOY Stance
defensive-stance.description: Lockdown defensive position, switching onto anyone
defensive-stance.prompt: power forward in perfect defensive stance - knees bent low, arms wide, eyes locked on ball handler, ready to switch onto any position 1-5, the defensive anchor who guards everyone, switchable nightmare

technical-foul-argument.name: Arguing Technical
technical-foul-argument.description: In the referee's face, animated protest
technical-foul-argument.prompt: power forward arguing intensely with referee - arms gesturing wildly, face contorted in outrage, stepping toward official, veins visible, the kind of argument that earns technicals, passion boiling over

celebrating-teammate.name: Hyping Teammates
celebrating-teammate.description: The ultimate teammate - celebrating Curry or Klay's shot
celebrating-teammate.expression: pure joy for others, team-first energy
celebrating-teammate.prompt: power forward celebrating teammate's big shot - jumping and pointing at shooter, face showing pure joy, arms raised in celebration of someone else's success, the glue guy who makes stars shine brighter

podcast-face.name: Podcast Smirk
podcast-face.description: The knowing smirk when he's about to say something controversial
podcast-face.prompt: power forward with knowing smirk and raised eyebrow - the look before dropping a hot take, slight lean forward, eyes gleaming with mischief, about to say something that will trend for days
